decks.notes: The deck focuses on using Underworld Breach to fuel combo pieces like Grinding Station and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student while using Mishra's Bauble and Emry, Lurker of the Loch to recur cards from the graveyard. The goal is to assemble a combo with The One Ring and Thassa's Oracle to win the game quickly. The deck also includes disruption in the form of Unholy Heat and Malevolent Rumble to control the board until the combo can be assembled. The Urza's Saga land package provides additional toolbox options for the deck.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quick and aggressive gameplay, centered around creatures like Amped Raptor and Guide of Souls to apply pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes key support cards like Arena of Glory and Static Prison to control the board and protect your creatures. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds consistency to the deck. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and powerful creature-based strategy, while also having options for removal and disruption when needed.

This deck aims to utilize powerful Eldrazi creatures and control spells to ramp up its mana production quickly and overwhelm the opponent. The deck includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Malevolent Rumble to deal with threats, along with hand disruption spells like Inquisition of Kozilek. The primary win conditions are through casting large Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. The deck also includes mana acceleration cards like Utopia Sprawl and Talisman of Resilience to help get ahead and cast the big Eldrazi threats faster.

The deck focuses on utilizing efficient creatures like Tarmogoyf and Nethergoyf to apply early pressure on the opponent. It also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Abrupt Decay to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Grist, the Hunger Tide provides additional value by creating tokens and disrupting the opponent's graveyard. The inclusion of Mishra's Bauble and Urza's Saga helps with card advantage and finding key pieces of the deck. Overall, the deck aims to be aggressive and proactive in its game plan while also having some disruption tools.

This deck utilizes a powerful combo strategy to quickly summon massive Eldrazi creatures onto the battlefield for a devastating finish. By using cards like Through the Breach and Talisman of Creativity to cheat out creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Ulamog, the Defiler, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with their immense power and abilities. Backup options like Kozilek's Return and Consign to Memory provide additional utility and removal options, making this deck a formidable force in a Modern 1 vs 1 matchup.

The key concept of this deck is to use a combination of powerful artifact cards like Goblin Charbelcher and Lotus Bloom, along with control spells like Counterspell and Disrupting Shoal, to quickly assemble a winning combo without relying on traditional lands. By utilizing cards like Thundertrap Trainer and Waterlogged Teachings, the deck aims to manipulate the opponent's resources and disrupt their game plan, allowing for a decisive victory. With a focus on combo-ing off quickly and efficiently, this Landless Combo deck is designed to outmaneuver and overwhelm opponents in Modern 1 vs 1 matches.

The deck focuses on using ramp cards like Talisman of Impulse and Eldrazi Temple to quickly cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Ulamog, the Defiler. It also utilizes control elements such as All Is Dust and Kozilek's Return to disrupt the opponent's board state. The key strategy is to use cards like Through the Breach and Sowing Mycospawn to cheat out Eldrazi creatures ahead of schedule, overwhelming the opponent with massive threats and locking down the game with Ugin's Labyrinth.
